application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient to satisfy the requirements of Condition 16 (Drainage Design) of planning permission 21/02177/FUL. Therefore, failing to prevent an increased risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with relevant policy requirements including but not limited to London Plan (2021) Policy SI 13, its associated Sustainable Design and Construction SPG, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems and Policy DM4 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 23 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 21/02177/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 16 (Drainage Design), 23 (Construction Management Plan), 26 (Fire Statement) of planning permission 21/02177/FUL (Retention of lower ground and ground floor levels for retail use, change of use of upper floors from retail/ancillary storage/office space to residential use, and construction of 3 additional storeys to provide a total of 56 residential dwellings)
